title: $2850, two bedrooms, 155 at 20 Ave, apt 1, SF, CA
posting_body: Address:
155, 20 Avenue, apt 1, SF, CA 94121, between Lake and California streets
Nice neighborhood near Sea Cliff
Open House dates and time:
August 6, 7,  13, 14, each day 1 p.m. to 3 p.m.
About this bright sunny apartment
Two big bedrooms with walk-in closet, wood floor though out
Large windows with natural sunlight
Spacious living room with dinning area, wood floor, huge windows, sunset warmth
eat-in kitchen, tile floor, lots of cabinets, granite counter top, electric stove, refrigerator
Coin operated washer and dryer in the building
Near transportation buses # 1, #1BX express on California, #38, #38 R on Geary to USF, Downtown, Chinatown, Bart, Ferry
transfer street car to Mission Bay, UCSF, General Hospital
Bus #29 on 25 Avenue to Stonestown Galleria, SF State U, City College
Close to restaurants, cafe, post office, banks, supermarkets, stores on Geary Blvd.
and Clement Street
Rent $2850 per month, one year lease, security deposit $3200
Rent includes one car parking in the garage
Tenants pay all utilities
No pet, No dog, No cat,  No smoking
Available now,  move in condition
Please come to see it to appreciate
